description: silhouettes of figures seated on log, riding horses and standing and crouching at water's edge; bridge with arches at center middle ground; boat at left
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [116/52 (?)]
provenance: A. Beurdeley, Lugt 421 (1847-1919), Paris. [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1994; sold in March for TOO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1994-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in the print: [A LEPERE]; LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère]; LLC at bottom edge, in pencil: [D\'abreuvoir du pont Marie]
title: Watering Place at Marie Bridge, Paris
